ThingDef.label: Slouch Hat
ThingDef.description: Based on an Old Earth design from the 3rd Era of Imperialism. This headgear is designed to protect the wearer from the worst heat they can find in the Rim. Providing not only cool headwear but also protecting the wearer from the worst that the sun can provide. Originally designed for usage on Spiceworld Regiments, it is now found in more worlds than the uniform that it came from.

ThingDef.label: Carapace Armor (Partisan)
ThingDef.description: Before the fall of the Coreworlds, the many armies of the Great Domain saw many servicemen divided into two groups, the Infantry and the Veterancy. While the Infantry was made up of various people from all walks of life, the Veterancy came from ancient nobility and were enhanced mechanically and biologically. This is the equipment of the Infantry, cheap and effective armor based on a plasteel framework with steel reinforcements to ensure an effective armor while being easy to produce compared to the Power Armor of the Veterancy. Its popularity remains after several centuries of usage

ThingDef.label: Partisan Bandoleer
ThingDef.description: A more modern form of webbing, seen often on the Rim. This configuration is suited towards magazine-based firearms that are more common among armies in the Rim. The generalized design makes this webbing versatile for all magazine sizes, ensuring a universal system for magazine storage. Bulky but providing more than enough ammunition to make up for the additional weight.

li.vanillaDesc: Webbing rig designed for magazine-fed weapons. Allows soldiers to reload quickly and keep a steady rate of fire. Bulky, but the extra ammunition offsets the weight.

ThingDef.label: Service Rifle (Bayonet)
ThingDef.description: Once considered the right arm of the free worlds, the partisan Rifle emerged during the great schisms. Before the mechanoid threat, separatists groups armed themselves with this ancient design. After centuries of fighting the Domain, the Bugs, and the Bots, the design has been further streamlined. parts made with polymers or woods changes to shaped steel, fine crafted metal turned to mass production stamps, and quality turned to quantity. Despite this. it is a favorite among mercenaries and colonial militias, some groups have even modified them to take bayonets and other ancient modifications. Now the weapon represents the worlds striving for freedom.

li.vanillaDesc: A simplified rifle design built using simpler parts. Light, cheap. and decently accurate, this rifle is considered a favorite in resource poor communities. A simplified design make it so even the poorest colonies are well armed.

ThingDef.label: Bayonet
ThingDef.description: Originally an ancient design from the Inter-Humanity Wars, now finds new life in the Rim. When warfare eventually fell into stagnation and trenches, this ancient weapon was again found in the hands of those in the trenches. Often hand-made by Army Blacksmiths, they come in a variety of shapes, sizes, and materials yet this design is the most popular. Unlike many weapons though, this one still found use against Insectoids. The spike blade would easily penetrate the chitin of an Insectoid and many veterans found themselves brave enough to do so.
